writer.name: 鲍里斯·帕沃尔·科南 Boris Paval Conen

director.name: 鲍里斯·帕沃尔·科南 Boris Paval Conen

introduction: The dance film Zugvögel (migrating birds) is part of a multi disciplinary project by the internationally renowned choreographer Jirí Kylián. Zugvögel was recorded on location in The Netherlands and in Germany. In May 2009 the dance and the film were shown at the Nationaltheater Munich.The film was directed by Boris Paval Conen together with Jirí Kylián. The music is by Han Otten.
